name: Trigon: Triangle Block Puzzle
description:
Trigon is a addicting brain teaser - a simple puzzle game that will challenge you, while also training your brain. Put your puzzle skills to the test with this exciting title. It will help you develop logic, and train your mental capacity.

The concept is simple - on a triangle board, combine puzzle blocks and clear the board by placing them strategically to create lines. Clear multiple lines at a time to get diamonds.

Check out special themes to make your game experience endlessly exciting! Enjoy the game with fun sounds and gorgeous visual effects. Use science of strategy and tactics. Enjoy!
